message: Thanks but what you just described is exactly what you have already said in the earlier statement "Practically, I think the benefit is that it made for better async demos". What I am trying to ask is, what would happen IF the ConfigureAwait(...) default value happened to be false, or IF the app developer happen to write the demo as "await GetJsonAsync(...).ConfigureAwait(FALSE)"? Will there be something functionally wrong when the top-level demo code does NOT resume in the same context?
